name: Quill and Plume Market
description: The Quill and Plume Market, a small wooden shop adorned with a peacock mural and a feather-shaped sign, offers a variety of bulk feathers and feather-embellished products. The shopâ€™s interior is filled with a colorful array of feathered garments and other decorative items, with one wall dedicated to barrels of feathers for bulk purchase. A backdoor leads to a workshop where artisans create custom goods. The owner, <u>Felicia Swan</u>, is an elegant woman who models her own feather-adorned creations and uses her rich vocabulary to sell her designs. Despite her openness about her work, she remains private about her personal life. Apprentice <u>Alistair Finch</u>, a young man with a keen eye for fashion, works primarily in the retail shop but is learning crafting skills, showing a particular talent for selecting the right assortment and colors of feathers for designs.

quest.name: The Enchanted Feather Hunt
quest.description: Felicia quietly inquires about a group of adventurers willing to take on a dangerous quest for excellent pay. One of her customers, a famed gladiator, wants a single tail feather from the rare celestial phoenix to tie around her neck as part of a wizard-designed necklace. This necklace will have the power to revive her if she dies, a tool she desires to allow her to fight even more recklessly while in the ring. The problem is that the celestial phoenix lives in a faraway, snowy mountain with a significant yeti population that is very proprietary towards their colorful companion and will actively defend it. The mission is high risk but also high reward if a group retrieves a tail feather plucked from the phoenix.
